import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login',{email,password});if(res.data.message==='Login successful'){navigate('/home');// Navigate only on successful login
}}catch(err){alert('Invalid credentials');console.error(err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]});}export default Login;
